document.full_text: in a coup for the big board, linkedin said on wednesday that it would be listing its shares on the new york stock exchange under the ticker symbol lnkd.
document.title: shunning nasdaq, linkedin prepares a big board i.p.o.
lines_and_colors: in a coup for the big board, linkedin said on wednesday that it would be listing its shares on the new york stock exchange under the ticker symbol lnkd.
